example or explain for the patterns: After reading the general instruction page, learners read through the catalog to get a overview of what topics they need to learn, then read some pages
Learners read general instruction and then check the rubir for essay, or the other way round
Learners read the general instruction and create/edit annotations during reading
Learners read the general instruction and navigate through pages during reading instruction
Learners make plan or check plan using planner tool, then navigate to read something
Learners open planner tool and make personal plan after reading instruction
Learners open planner tool and make personal plan in the first 15 mins
Learners search certain contents according to instruction and plan.
Learners check instruction/rubric when they run into read some irrelevant pages then move on to read some relevant pages, which showed evaluation pattern of these irrelevant materials
Learners check instruction/rubric when they read their own writing then move on to wirte or read something else, which showed evaluation pattern of these writing
Learners read previous notes during navigation
Learners check of progress according to instruction and plan.
Check planner, during writing the essay, to monitor if there is enough time to finish the essay
Learners check timer during reading or writing as monitoring the learning time
Learners open planner tool and check or change personal plan after the first 15 mins
Learners search certain annotations
Learners read certain annotations
Learners read certain annotations
Learners read and highlight new learning materials
Learners read something new and then nagvigate to next page to continue reading
During reading, learners take notes or highlight something, also they might read their notes or highlight
Learners read several pages continuously
Learners read new irrelevant learning materials
Learners read new relevant learning materials for some mins
Learners review some relevant learning materials they have been reading before
Learners review some irrelevant learning materials they have been reading before
After re-reading some learning materials, learners write their essay
After reading the rubric, learners write their essay
Learners write the essay continuously
During writing the essay, learners read their highlights or notes
Learners create or choose label for the highlights they made during learning
